question: Which among the following was not one of the salient features of Poona Pact?
option1: Reservation in Provincial legislatures in favor of the depressed classes
option2: 18% Reservation for depressed classes in the central legislatures
option3: Education grant for the depressed classes
option4: Double voting for the depressed classes in some select electorates
answer: Double voting for the depressed classes in some select electorates
explanation: The option which says that Double voting for the depressed classes in some select electorates was not a feature. In fact double voting which was demanded by Dr. Ambedkar in the beginning got nullified with this pact, and Dr. Ambedkar was not happy with the pact.
